mcq.statement: Which countries are included in the Indian subcontinent?

options.a: Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan, Sri Lanka
options.b: Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Afghanistan, Iran, Nepal, Pakistan
options.c: India, Sri Lanka, Myanmar, Nepal, Pakistan, Bangladesh
options.d: India, Nepal, Bhutan, China, Pakistan, Bangladesh

mcq.one_liner: The Indian subcontinent comprises **Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan, and Sri Lanka**.
